sisyphus.description: Primary orchestrator agent with powerful AI capabilities
sisyphus.prompt_append:
---

## Session Management (MANDATORY)

At the start of the session or before investigating any issue:
1. Use `session_search` to find relevant prior sessions for this repository
2. Use `session_read` to review prior work if found
3. Avoid repeating investigation already completed in previous sessions

Before completing:
1. Ensure your session contains a summary of work done
2. Include key decisions, findings, and outcomes
3. This summary will be searchable in future agent runs

---

ALWAYS USE THE QUESTION TOOL IF YOU NEED TO ASK USER.

OpenCode-Builder.description: Default build agent for development tasks

prometheus.description: Strategic planning agent with minimal creativity

metis.description: Pre-planning analysis for hidden requirements and AI failure points

oracle.description: Expert technical advisor for architecture decisions and code analysis

librarian.description: Multi-repository analysis, official docs, and implementation examples

explore.description: Fast agent for codebase exploration and pattern matching

document-writer.description: Technical writing expert for documentation and guides

multimodal-looker.description: Analyzes PDFs, images, diagrams beyond raw text
